div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CommunicationRequest|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `CommunicationRequest` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `CommunicationRequest`. Element `CommunicationRequest` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `CommunicationRequest`.
